body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Christopher Cook and the customer's name is Angela Sanders.  The conversation is about Bob's Gym (a Gym ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Acme Customer Support. My name is Jane. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jane. I'm having an issue with my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Could I get your name to look up your order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Can I have your order number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's two four five eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. One more thing, could you provide me with your email address linked to this order?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John. I see the issue with your order, and I'll make sure it gets resolved promptly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time and for calling Acme Customer Support. Have a great day!
